property.name: proxy.enable
property.description: whether using proxy, value is 'true' or not

property.name: mobile.userAgent
property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.4.2; M812C Build/KVT49L) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/39.0.2171.59 Mobile Safari/537.36

property.name: web.userAgent
property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/39.0.2171.95 Safari/537.36
property.description: to view your browser's userAgent, please access http://whatsmyuseragent.com/

property.name: page.validPeriod
property.description: unit is second. For a month is 3600*24*30=2592000. If 0, is not save and not read from local cache; if negative, always read from local cache if exists

property.name: download.sleepMilliseconds
property.description: sleep milliseconds when between two web page download
